title: To the Kings most Excellent Maiesty The humble gratulation; and petition of the trained bands, and freeholders, and others the gentry and communalty of the county palatine of Chester, whose names and vnder-written. Delivered upon Hoole-Heath, by the trayned bands, a coppie of the same being hung upon the top of every colours; subscribed by the severall companies, and so presented to the King.
